sentences.sContent: This program is beamed at Russia.
sentences.sCn: 这套节目是对俄罗斯广播的。

sentences.sContent: That transmitter was beamed at Russia.
sentences.sCn: 那台发射机曾用于对俄罗斯广播。

sentences.sContent: He was doubling for America and Russia.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was doubling for America and Russia.
sentences.sCn: 他给美国和俄罗斯当双重间谍。
